specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Slub Slub yarn is made with varying thicknesses, causing the fabric to have a bumpy texture. It adds a unique texture and character to the fabric's surface.
specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Natural > Plant > Linen Linen fabric is made from natural materials, so it may have small bumps (slubs) in it. It is also important to keep linen fabric dry, because it can shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store linen fabric in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air. Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Pajamas, Shirts, Blouses
